reviews.review_msg: She's an awesome prof for first year psyc. She's engaging, speaks the material clearly and makes you feel comfortable approaching her about the content. Fair exams and asks fair things in her projects and papers. Good prof

She's not a very good prof, she is BEYOND boring, the only reason you HAVE to go is for the dumb i-clicker quizzes and questions, you can't even leave after the break because you have to answer "70%" of the questions which can happen any moment. However, the class is not too hard as long as you're good a memorizing things.
Very good professor.The exams are very fair and quite easy if you read the textbook.She's nice and helpful in her office hours as well.
Terrible Proff. She must not have much experience considering she can't answer any questions we asked her. Reads right off of powerpoint. Tests were too hard compared to her lame lectures.
HORRIFIC PROF!!!! I WANNA DIE AS SOON AS I STEP INTO ONE OF HER LECTURES. YOU CAN HEAR HALF THE CLASS SNORING BECAUSE SHE WILL PUT YOU TO SLEEP!!!!
